text: Mitigation of cytokine-mediated adverse reactions by hydrocortisone treatment prior to or following i.v. poly (ICLC) administration reduced both the hypotensive responses and IFN induction in rabbits [115] . The IL-1R signalling pathway, stimulated by poly (ICLC) is implicated in increased plasma IL-6 concentrations. Male rats given IL-1 receptor agonist (IL-1ra) prior to poly (IC) administration had elevated plasma TNF-, but not IL-6, concentrations and a reduction of fever [139] .
